sentences.sContent: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.
sentences.sContent_eng: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.

sentences.sContent: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.sContent_eng: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.sCn: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

sentences.sContent: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.sCn: 他还从桤树、松树和柳树上捕捉到了花粉。

trans.tranOther: a type of tree that has long thin branches and grows near water, or the wood from this tree
